entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
